data.title: New Devilman G Manga Launches in Champion Red Magazine
data.meta_description: Mikarun X's Rui Takatō to illustrate new spinoff series based on Go Nagai's original manga
data.text:
The cover for the May issue of Akita Shoten's Monthly Champion RED magazine has revealed that the issue will preview a new Devilman spinoff manga titled Devilman G. The magazine will go on sale on Monday.

Rui Takatō (Scape-God, Once Again!, Mikarun X) will illustrate the new series. Takatō previously launched the Once Again! manga with writer Yoshirō Nabeta in Shueisha's Jump X magazine in June 2011.

Devilman original creator Gō Nagai and his Dynamic Pro studio previously serialized the one-volume Devilman vs. Getter Robo manga in Monthly Champion RED in 2010.
